description: Bring a slice of Italy into your kitchen with these divine pizzas. They'll become a family favourite in no time.
name: Marinara Meatball Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.33 qty big batch meatballs in tomato basil sauce, thawed overnight in fridge, if necessary

recipeInstructions.text: Place flour, baking powder and salt flakes in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre. Add yoghurt and oil, then mix to form a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface. Knead for 1 minute or until smooth. Divide dough equally into 2 portions. Using a rolling pin, roll each portion into a 20 x 30cm oval.
Preheat oven to 240°C/220°C fan-forced. Heat 2 baking trays in oven for 5 minutes.
Place bases on baking paper. Spread 1 cup sauce over bases. Scatter over cheeses. Arrange meatballs over pizzas.
Use baking paper to transfer pizzas to baking trays. Bake for 20 minutes or until bases are golden and cheese has melted. Serve topped with basil.
